    • Garden

      public Garden()

    • Garden

      public Garden​(java.lang.String name, double spent, double budget, java.util.ArrayList<Plot> plots, int lepsSupported, java.util.ArrayList<Plant> plants, double pixelsperfoot)
      Main constructor for Garden
      Parameters:
      name - name of garden
      spent - how much of the budget is spent
      budget - how much budget the user has
      plots - ArrayList of plots in the garden
      lepsSupported - how many leps the garden supports
      plants - ArrayList of plants in the garden
      pixelsperfoot - pixels per feet for scaling
